message.entry: Unexpected structuring element type.
For arbitrary structuring elements, the HEIGHT input must be a real double matrix with the same size as the NHOOD input.
Too few inputs for ''{0}'' structuring element.
Too many inputs for ''{0}'' structuring element.
For octagon structuring elements, the SIZE input must be a nonnegative multiple of 3.
For rectangle structuring elements, SIZE must have two elements.
For a cuboid shaped structuring element, SIZE must have three elements.
For pair structuring elements, OFFSET must have two elements.
For periodic line structuring elements, V must be a two-element vector.
For disk structuring elements, N must be 0, 4, 6, or 8.
Unrecognized structuring element type.
Method {0} is not supported for code generation.

entry.note: {0} is the class name, and cannot be moved to later in the string

message.entry: {0} is a {1} shaped structuring element with properties:
Strel must be a 1-by-1 array.
Invalid class for concatenation.
The function, strel supports only one-dimensional indexing.
Cannot convert to {0}.
Vertical concatenation is not supported for code generation when creating strel arrays. Please consider using one dimensional indexing or horizontal concatenation
The function, strel does not support arrays for codegeneration.
The function, strel does not support arrays when generating code for GPU Targets.
